org.gridgain.grid.loaders.servlet
Class GridServletContextListenerLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.loaders.servlet.GridServletContextListenerLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
@GridLoader(description="Servlet context listener loader")
public class GridServletContextListenerLoader
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

This class defines GridGain loader based on servlet context listener. This loader can be used to start GridGain inside any web container. Loader must be defined in web.xml file. 

 <context-param>
     <param-name>cfgFilePath</param-name>
     <param-value>config/default-spring.xml</param-value>
 </context-param>

 <listener>
     <listener-class>org.gridgain.grid.loaders.servlet.GridServletContextListenerLoader</listener-class>
 </listener>
